# AI Music API

## Docs
- [AI Music API - Generate Music with Suno, Udio, Riffusion, Nuro Models](https://docs.sunoapi.com/ai-music-api-introduction.md): Discover how the AI Music API allows you to generate music using 4 advanced models (Suno, Udio, Riffusion, Nuro). Supports multi-language, vocal/pure music creation with custom and random modes.
- [AI Music API Credits Usage Guide - Subscription & Extra Credits Explained](https://docs.sunoapi.com/ai-music-api-credits-usage-guide.md): Learn how to manage your credits with the AI Music API. Understand the unified credit system, monthly subscriptions, extra credits, and consumption rules for Suno, Riffusion, and Nuro models.
- [AI Music API Error Handling Guide - Common Errors & Solutions](https://docs.sunoapi.com/ai-music-api-error-handling-guide.md): Learn how to handle errors efficiently while using the AI Music API. Explore common error codes, troubleshooting tips, and best practices to ensure smooth integration and usage.
- suno [Suno AI Music Generation API | Studio-Quality Tracks in 2 min](https://docs.sunoapi.com/suno-api-instructions.md): discover the Suno AI Music Generation API—create studio-level tracks with vocals or instrumentals in under 2 mins, lyrics & styles, and license everything commercially.
- riffusion [Riffusion AI Music Generation API | Studio-Quality Tracks in 60s](https://docs.sunoapi.com/riffusion-api-instructions.md): discover the Riffusion AI Music Generation API—create studio-level tracks with vocals or instrumentals in under 60 seconds, swap vocals & styles, and license everything commercially.
- nuro [Nuro API Overview - AI Music API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/nuro-api-overview.md): Discover the Nuro music generation model, developed by MusicAPI and a tech company. Learn how it can generate a complete 4-minute song in just 30 seconds with extensive customization options.
- nuro [Nuro API Error Handling - AI Music API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/nuro-api-error-handling.md): Learn how to handle errors when using the Nuro API. Get detailed information on common error codes and troubleshooting tips to ensure smooth integration with the AI music API.

## API Docs
- suno [Create Music API | AI Music Generation with Suno & Udio & Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-suno-music.md): Use the create-music POST API to generate AI-powered music with suno V4 , riffusion API. Convert text prompts into professional-quality music and AI vocals. Learn about request parameters, audio formats, and API best practices for seamless music creation.
- suno [Describe to Music API | AI Song Generation with Suno & Riffusion](https://docs.sunoapi.com/describe-music.md): Use the describe-music POST API to generate AI songs directly from a short text description. Leverage Suno and Riffusion models to turn your ideas into high-quality music with ease.
- suno [Voice Gender API | Control AI Singer Voice with Suno & Riffusion](https://docs.sunoapi.com/music-voice-gender.md): Use the voice-gender parameter to select male or female vocals in AI-generated music. Works seamlessly with Suno and Riffusion models to give you full control over vocal character and tone.
- suno [Lyrics & Style Generator | Custom Songs with Suno & Riffusion](https://docs.sunoapi.com/custom-lyrics-style.md): Enable auto_lyrics to let Suno or Riffusion generate lyrics and musical style from a description. Ideal for creating full custom songs from scratch using powerful AI models.
- suno [Extend Music API | AI-Powered Music Extension with Suno](https://docs.sunoapi.com/extend-suno-music.md): Use the extend-music POST API to seamlessly extend AI-generated music with Suno V4 and Riffusion API. Maintain musical coherence and enhance audio quality with professional AI music generation. Learn about request parameters, seamless looping, and best practices.
- suno [Concat Music API | Seamlessly Merge AI-Generated Music with Suno](https://docs.sunoapi.com/concat-suno-music.md): Use the concat-music POST API to merge AI-generated music segments into a seamless full-length track with Suno V4  API. Ensure smooth transitions and high-quality audio for professional music production. Learn about request parameters, audio formats, and best practices.
- suno [Cover Music API | AI-Powered Song Covers with Sonic](https://docs.sunoapi.com/cover-suno-music.md): Use the cover-music POST API to create AI-generated song covers with Suno V4 and Suno API. Transform existing tracks with AI vocal synthesis and professional-quality audio. Learn about request parameters, supported formats, and best practices for AI song covers.
- suno [AI Music API – Stems Basic: Extract Vocals and Instrumental from Song ID (2 Tracks)](https://docs.sunoapi.com/stems-basic.md): Use AI Music API's Stems Basic feature to split any song by Song ID into two high-quality audio tracks: isolated vocals and pure instrumental. Perfect for karaoke, remixes, podcasts, and content creation.

- suno [AI Music API – Stems Full: Extract 12 Detailed Vocal and Instrument Tracks from Song ID](https://docs.sunoapi.com/stems-full.md): AI Music API's Stems Full feature extracts up to 12 individual stems from a song by Song ID, including lead vocals, backing vocals, drums, bass, piano, guitar, and more — giving creators maximum control for mixing and production.

- suno [Create Persona API | AI Voice Model Training with Suno](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-suno-persona.md): Use the create-persona POST API to generate a custom AI voice model from any song URL with Suno V4 API. Create your unique persona and use its vocal characteristics to generate new AI-powered music. Learn about request parameters, training process, and best practices.
- suno [Create Persona Music API | Generate AI Songs with Custom Voices](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-suno-persona-music.md): Use the create-persona-music POST API to generate AI songs using your custom persona voice with Suno V4 API. Transform text into music with personalized AI vocals. Learn about request parameters, supported formats, and best practices for AI-driven music creation.
- suno [Upload Music API | Upload & Process Your Own Music with AI](https://docs.sunoapi.com/upload-suno-music.md): Use the upload-music POST API to upload and process your own music files with Suno V4 API. Enable AI-powered enhancements, remixing, and transformations. Learn about request parameters, supported file formats, and best practices for seamless integration.
- suno [AI Music API – Get WAV from Song ID: Convert Original MP3 to High-Quality WAV](https://docs.sunoapi.com/wav.md): AI Music API's WAV feature converts any generated song from MP3 to lossless WAV format by Song ID. Perfect for professional audio editing, mastering, and high-fidelity playback.

- suno [Get Music API | Retrieve AI-Generated Music by Task ID](https://docs.sunoapi.com/get-suno-music.md): Use the get-music GET API to retrieve AI-generated music details using a task ID with Suno V4 API. Access metadata, download links, and processing status for your generated tracks. Learn about request parameters, response formats, and best practices.
- riffusion [Create Music with Lyrics - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-music-with-lyrics-riffusion.md): Generate unique music tracks with lyrics using the Riffusion API.
- riffusion [Create Music with Description - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-music-with-description-riffusion.md): Generate music based on a detailed description using Riffusion's API.
- riffusion [Cover Music - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/cover-music-riffusion.md): Easily create music covers with the Riffusion API for a new musical experience.
- riffusion [Extend Music - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/extend-music-riffusion.md): Extend existing music tracks with new elements using Riffusion's API.
- riffusion [Replace Music Section - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/replace-music-section-riffusion.md): Seamlessly replace sections of music to create a new version with Riffusion's API.
- riffusion [Swap Music Sound - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/swap-music-sound-riffusion.md): Swap different sounds in your music tracks using Riffusion's advanced API.
- riffusion [Swap Music Vocals - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/swap-music-vocals-riffusion.md): Replace vocals in music tracks while keeping the background music intact with Riffusion's API.
- riffusion [Upload Music - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/upload-music-riffusion.md): Upload your own music for further processing with the Riffusion API.
- riffusion [Get Music - Riffusion API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/get-music-riffusion.md): Retrieve generated music tracks with the Riffusion API to use in your projects.
- nuro [Create Vocal Music - Nuro API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-vocal-music-nuro.md): Generate high-quality vocal music using the Nuro API. Create customized vocal tracks tailored to your needs with fast, efficient processing.
- nuro [Create Instrumental Music - Nuro API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/create-instrument-music-nuro.md): Generate instrument-only music using the Nuro API. Ideal for background scores, instrumental tracks, and more.
- nuro [Get Music - Nuro API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/get-music-nuro.md): Retrieve the music generated by the Nuro API. Access your created tracks and explore various music generation options.
- lyrics generation [Lyrics Generation - AI Music API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/lyrics-generation.md): Generate song lyrics using the AI Music API API. Create meaningful lyrics tailored to your music tracks with multiple variations.
- [Get Credits - AI Music API](https://docs.sunoapi.com/get-credits.md): Check your available credits for the AI Music API API. Keep track of your usage and manage your subscription effectively.
